name: Minecraft Java Edition
about: A sandbox game with infinite worlds, block-building mechanics, and exploration. Popular for mods and customizations.

name: Terraria
about: A 2D sandbox game that focuses on exploration, crafting, and combat.

name: Luanti, previously Minetest
about: A voxel-based game engine, similar to Minecraft, with a focus on world-building and exploration.

name: Space Engineers
about: A sandbox game focusing on engineering, space exploration, and survival.

name: Vintage Story
about: A survival sandbox with a deep crafting system and a focus on exploration and progression.

name: Rising World
about: A sandbox game with a realistic world, dynamic terrain, and various crafting options.

name: 7 Days to Die
about: A zombie survival game with a focus on crafting, building, and exploring.

name: Conan Exiles
about: A survival game set in the world of Conan the Barbarian, featuring building, combat, and exploration.

name: V Rising
about: A vampire survival game with exploration, combat, and building mechanics.

name: Starbound
about: A 2D sandbox game with exploration, crafting, and combat across multiple planets.

name: Ark
about: A survival game set in a prehistoric world filled with dinosaurs and crafting.

name: Soulmask
about: A survival and combat game set in a dark, fantasy world.

name: ECO
about: A sandbox game where players build and manage a society, focusing on environmental sustainability.

name: The Forest
about: A survival horror game where players must survive on an island inhabited by mutants.

name: Icarus
about: A cooperative survival game set on an alien planet, with exploration and resource gathering.

name: Myth of Empires
about: A historical MMO focusing on empire-building, combat, and crafting in ancient Asia.

name: Satisfactory
about: A factory-building game set on an alien planet, focused on optimizing production lines and automation.

name: Starbase
about: A space MMO focusing on detailed ship-building and exploration.

name: Stationeers
about: A space station simulation game, where players manage and build within a complex space environment.

name: Valheim
about: A survival game set in a procedurally-generated Norse world, focusing on exploration, combat, and building.

name: Life is Feudal
about: A medieval MMO that emphasizes crafting, building, and survival.

name: Craftopia
about: A sandbox RPG with a focus on crafting, combat, and exploration.

name: Colony Survival
about: A voxel-based survival strategy game where players build and defend a colony.
